title: 세미나(Computational Model of Perspective for  Generating Baseball Summaries)
content:
현재 MIT에서 박사과정에 공부중인 오해윤씨가 전산학전공에서 세미나를
하오니 관심있는 학생들은 참석하시기 바랍니다.

세미나제목 : 
          Computational Model of Perspective for Generating Baseball    
          Summaries
          
연  사 :   오해윤 (MIT 박사과정)
시  간 :   11월 23일 (목) 오후 4시
장  소 :   전산학과 4층 안영경 강의실

ABSTRACT:
I will describe building and evaluating a system for generating text summaries of baseball games from multiple perspectives. For many sports games, there are at least two summary newspaper articles, at least one from each team's perspective. I will first present an analysis of how different newspaper articles written about the same game differ, depending on the perspective. Then I will describe a computational model of perspective. Finally, I will present my system for generating summaries from multiple
perspectives and a preliminary evaluation result.
